class_description:
Thrown if an application attempts to access or modify a field, or
 to call a method that it does not have access to. Normally, this error is caught by the compiler; this error can
 only occur at run time if the definition of a class has
 incompatibly changed.

Methods.method_description: Constructs an IllegalAccessError with no detail message.

Constructs an IllegalAccessError with the specified
 detail message.
